ui_control.name: db_work_load
ui_control.label: What kind of workload is supported by database (OLTP, OLAP or Mixed)?

ui_control.name: db_app_type
ui_control.label: What kind of applications are using database?
ui_control.placeholder: Example: Custom application, COTS, SAP, Custom ERP, Micro stargy etc.

ui_control.name: primary_app
ui_control.label: What is the primary application which make use of this database?
ui_control.placeholder: Enter application name which make use of this database

ui_control.name: prconn_str_primary_app
ui_control.label: What is connection string being used by primary application?
ui_control.placeholder: Enter connection string being used by primary application

ui_control.name: conn_pool_setting
ui_control.label: What is connection pool setting (Minimum and maximum no. of connections)?
ui_control.placeholder: Enter connection used setting Minimum and maximum no of connections

ui_control.name: app_conn_upc_jdbc_oci_etc
ui_control.label: Application making connection to database using UCP or JDBC thin or OCI connection or ORM?
ui_control.placeholder: Enter how application is connecting with database

ui_control.name: other_app_connected
ui_control.label: What are other applications (BI, ETL etc.) connecting to database?
ui_control.placeholder: Enter othe applications connecting to database

ui_control.name: other_app
ui_control.label: How other applications are connecting to database?
ui_control.placeholder: Enter number of applications connected to this database

ui_control.name: ssl_connection
ui_control.label: Are application are using SSL connection to connect to database?

ui_control.name: conn_remote_db
ui_control.label: Are you connecting to any remote database using Heterogeneous database services or Database Gateway?

ui_control.name: Schema_in_migration
ui_control.label: How many schemas are participating in migration?
